synopsis:
Andrew Chen's 3rd animated short film, Forever kiss. Originally published in 2006 as a class project. The subject for this project is "One Minute Eternity." Each animator was tasked to produced what they think is a one-minute eternity. The topic for this video is love between men and women. It is the experience of the moment when a couple kisses; the things around you; the oath of time; although "short'', it seems to be "eternal''!

(Source: Official Description)
